reviewText: Perhaps I had false expectations what I thought a 'study resource' meant.  The DVD was more like a 5 minute commercial for each of chapters instead of a study guide.  I was hoping it would be a study resource that could help with the meetings and really didn't fit that at all.  I would rename it as something different, post the 'commercials' on website/youtube or build a out a study resource to compliment the chapters/book.
Outstanding videos to stimulate group discussions - along with the book
Great product!  Life changing for those who are in need of some direction.
The DVD is a study series for my husband's and his men's group. It has been a great series for the group. My husband says  there have been  many significant positive comments.
